tasks.label: Install Requirements
tasks.command: cd venv/robot_battle && python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip && python3 -m pip install -r requirements_simon.txt

tasks.label: Create Virtual Env
tasks.command: cd venv/robot_battle && python3 -m venv ./ && source bin/activate

tasks.label: Clone Repo
tasks.command: cd venv && git clone https://github.com/Karl-Eiholzer/robot_battle.git && cd robot_battle
